test-case.name: math-3305
test-case.description: Test of abs() on all numeric data types.

all-of.assert: /out/double[@a="3.2" and @b="3.2" and @c="0" and @d="0" and @e="NaN" and @f="INF" and @g="INF"]
/out/float[@a="3.2" and @b="3.2" and @c="0" and @d="0" and @e="NaN" and @f="INF" and @g="INF"]

test-case.name: math-3305a
test-case.description: Test of abs() on all numeric data types. Variant forcing runtime evaluation

all-of.assert: /out/double[@a="3.2" and @b="3.2" and @c="0" and @d="0" and @e="NaN" and @f="INF" and @g="INF"]
/out/float[@a="3.2" and @b="3.2" and @c="0" and @d="0" and @e="NaN" and @f="INF" and @g="INF"]
